title: Effect of Kim's bond purchase on XYZ Bank, MS

content.question: The table above shows the current entries in the T-account of  <math alttext="XYZ."><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>XYZ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> Bank. Kim purchases a bond issued by the central bank for $50,000 and pays for the bond by drawing on her company’s account at  <math alttext="XYZ."><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>XYZ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> Bank. What is the effect of Kim’s purchase of the bond on the required and excess reserves of  <math alttext="XYZ."><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>XYZ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> Bank and the total money supply?

choices.label:

 Excess
 Money Supply

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
